info.titleen: Could you make some copies for me?
info.descko: 스토어 오픈을 위해 윌슨은 톰에게 어떤 도움을 요청했나요?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: Not right now. Do you need help with something, Ms. Wilson?
sentense.en_: Not right now. Do you need help with something, Ms. Wilson?
sentense.ko: 아니, 지금은 괜찮아. 윌슨 양, 도움이 필요하니?

sentense.en: Yes, I'm trying to finish this display for the store opening tomorrow.
sentense.en_: Yes, I'm trying to finish this display for the store opening tomorrow.
sentense.ko: 어, 난 내일 스토어 오픈을 위해서 가게 꾸미는 일을 끝내려고 하고 있어.

sentense.en: It's a lot of work, isn't it?
sentense.en_: It's a lot of work, isn't it?

sentense.en: It sure is. Could you make some copies for me?
sentense.en_: It sure is. Could you make some copies for me?
sentense.ko: 정말 그래. 복사 좀 해줄 수 있어?

sentense.en: I'd like to get 300 copies of this advertisement.
sentense.en_: I'd like to get 300 copies of this advertisement.

sentense.en: We're going to pass them out at the door.
sentense.en_: We're going to pass them out at the door.

sentense.en: Do you want them just like this? On white paper?
sentense.en_: Do you want them just like this? On white paper?

sentense.en: No, why don't you do them on different colors?
sentense.en_: No, why don't you do them on different colors?
sentense.ko: 아니, 다른 색깔에 하는 건 어때?

sentense.en: It'll be more eye-catching that way.
sentense.en_: It'll be more eye-catching that way.
sentense.ko: 그것이 더 눈에 잘 띄게 될 거야.

sentense.en: Okay. I'll be back as soon as possible.
sentense.en_: Okay. I'll be back as soon as possible.
